name: Toothpick Quest
description:
Controls for HTML5:
Up - Up Arrow / W  
Down - Down Arrow / S  
Left - Left Arrow / A  
Right - Right Arrow / D  
A - Alt / Z / J  
B - Ctrl / K / X  
Start - Enter  
Select - Shift

This is the first video game I've finished.
It's extremely basic and can be beaten in a few minutes.

Made with GB Studio.
